channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SCOTUS lifts limits on LA raids. And, Nation's Report Card shows drops in scores

item.title: Russian Bomb Kills at Least 23 Picking Up Pensions, Ukraine Says
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky said that the strike on older people in a Donetsk village should prompt a global response.

item.title: The Forces Behind Nepal’s Explosive Gen Z Protests: What to Know
item.description: It was a recent ban on social media that brought young people to the streets, but they came filled with grievances that have built up over years.

item.title: Here's what happens when private equity buys homes in your neighborhood
item.description: What makes rents go down and neighborhood diversity go up? Corporate landlords. But they also make it harder to own for yourself.

item.title: Job Growth Revised Down by Nearly a Million, Updated BLS Data Shows
item.description: Preliminary annual revisions could add to political pressure on the agency that produces the data.

item.title: 12th Grade Reading Skills Hit a New Low
item.description: High school seniors had the worst reading scores since 1992 on a national test, a loss probably related to increases in screen time and the pandemic. ...
